name: Earth defense 2
description:
Earth defense 2 is a simple addictive space arcade, where you must destroy comets and asteroids that are moving towards planet Earth.

How to Play: To destroy a comet or asteroid just tap on it. In competition mode you can also use medic aid(to fill your health points), slow motion(to slow the time) or nuclear bomb(all comets and asteroids will explode).
You can buy them with virtual money in our shop or with real money. If you purchase coins with real money we will also remove ads from game.

Tips: If you have troubles in completing last 3 levels in single player mode you can go to competition mode and buy some extra slow motion packages or nuclear bombs.

Try get as high Top Score as you can in Competition mode.

If you like this game, please give it a rate and review. I hope that you will have fun with playing Earth defense 2.
